knowledge_snapshot.summary: Knowledge Graph stores facts, Reasoning Graph stores decisions, Task Graph stores execution state.
knowledge_snapshot.title: Three-layer graph model

acceptance_criteria: A scoped objective statement is recorded in task description
At least one explicit non-goal or constraint is documented in task inputs
task_snapshot.title: Clarify scope and constraints

acceptance_criteria: Task decomposition contains 3-10 actionable items
Dependency edges are acyclic and every dependency references a valid task id
task_snapshot.title: Prepare execution plan and work breakdown

acceptance_criteria: Each task has 2-4 measurable acceptance criteria
Validation report states pass/fail for dependency and DoD quality checks
task_snapshot.title: Validate planned tasks and Definition of Done

acceptance_criteria: Task decomposition contains 3-10 actionable items
Dependency edges are acyclic and every dependency references a valid task id

acceptance_criteria: Each task has 2-4 measurable acceptance criteria

acceptance_criteria: A plain-language summary is attached to plan output
Each task title has a one-sentence explanation understandable by non-developers
task_snapshot.title: Document plan decisions and handoff details

acceptance_criteria: Applied TG tasks include origin_plan_id and created_by metadata
TG index rebuild verification returns pass status
task_snapshot.title: Apply approved task plan to Task Graph

acceptance_criteria: context_pack.latest.json points to newest commit_id
A timestamped context pack history file is written
task_snapshot.title: Maintain Context Pack for each meaningful interaction

acceptance_criteria: post_response_commits.jsonl has commit_id per meaningful response
Each commit entry includes changed node ids
task_snapshot.title: Record post-response commits

acceptance_criteria: Every conflict record has at least one TG resolution task
Resolution tasks include tag conflict_resolution
task_snapshot.title: Resolve graph conflicts via tagged tasks
